isis.stitle: CAB: DAYCAB AND SLEEPER CAB for ProStar, ProStar Premium, and ProStar Limited Models - REMOVE - ENGINE COVER TRIM PANEL and cup holder

svcproc.title: ENGINE COVER TRIM PANEL and cup holder

svcsubproc.title: Remove Engine Cover Trim Panel and Cup Holder on Daycab and Sleeper Cab
svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 95
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove one pan head torx screw (Item 8) from top left side of engine cover trim panel (Item 9). Lay pan head torx screw out of the way and save for installation.
Remove one pan head torx screw (Item 8) from front right side of engine cover trim panel (Item 9). Lay pan head torx screw out of the way and save for installation.
Remove two pan head torx screw (Item 8) from upper right side of engine cover trim panel (Item 9). Lay pan head torx screws out of the way and save for installation.
Slide engine cover trim panel (Item 9) out from under center dash control panel. Lay engine cover trim panel out of the way and save for installation.

note.para: There are two plastic tabs positioned on the back of the right side of engine cover trim panel (Item 9). The lower plastic tab slides into lower console brace (Item 10). The upper plastic tab slides into support bracket (Item 11). The lower console brace and support bracket are attached to the AC cover trim panel (Item 12).
